title: Bought properties(car, house..) in past on loan out of ignorance, can I use them now Assim al hakeem
transcript: camel from saudi arabia he says we bought many properties when we were ignorant cars on loans now we know that it is haram what should we do what is past is past when you were ignorant allah will not hold you accountable and this is from allah's mercy so it's gone as long as you have paid for it in full it's yours you can use it you can sell it you can benefit from it without any problem inshallah
